alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 6:52PM CDT until March 31 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WHITESIDE...EASTERN JO DAVIESS...CARROLL AND STEPHENSON COUNTIES... At 652 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jo Daviess County Fairgrounds to near Coleta, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Milledgeville, Coleta and Lake Le-Aqua-na State Park around 655 PM CDT. Lena, Winslow, Carroll County Fairgrounds and Hitt around 700 PM CDT. Mc Connell around 705 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Buena Vista, Oneco, Orangeville, Afolkey, Rock Grove, Davis and Lake Summerset. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Illinois.
